amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute sought to delete provisions that place a cap on punitive damages; provide for a cooling off period and alternative dispute resolution procedures; prohibit frivolous class action lawsuits; and impose a duty on plaintiffs to mitigate damages.
amendment.purpose: An amendment in the nature of a substitute numbered 6 and printed in H. Rept. 106-134 to strike provisions that limit punitive damages; provide a cooling off period and alternative dispute resolution procedures; prohibit frivolous class action lawsuits; and impose a duty on plaintiffs to mitigate damages.

action.text: Amendment (A006) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Conyers.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Conyers amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 190 - 236 (Roll no. 126).
